EmployeeCrisisAssessment.name: EmployeeCrisisAssessment
EmployeeCrisisAssessment.description: Represents a crisis assessment of an Employee.

Assessment.description: The employeeâ€™s COVID-19 status at the time of the assessment.

AssessmentDate.description: The date of the assessment. Required

CrisisId.description: The Crisis that this assessment is associated with.

EmployeeId.description: Required. The Employee that this assessment is associated with.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who currently owns this record. Default value is the user logged in to the API to perform the create operation.

SourceAssessment.description: The record in the source system that drove this assessment.

SourceSystem.description: The source system that drove this assessment.
